title: Chao Neng Tu Zhandui
synopsis: Humans left four rabbits on the moon. Fortunately, they were adopted by Chang'e. Chang'e is a standard "soil, fat and round", but she is good at changing appearance, always dressing herself up to deceive the world. The four rabbits and Chang'e depended on each other for their lives. Under the influence of the eyes and ears, the rabbits naturally "joined" and became Chang'e's accomplices. 　　 Big Bear Habi has always regarded Chang'e as the goddess in his heart. In order to see the goddess' true face, he would go to the moon in person, but found that Chang'e's face was very different from what he saw on the Internet. In a rage, Habi kidnapped Chang'e, hoping to teach her a lesson. The rabbits followed in the footsteps of their masters and came to the earth. Here they met a young man named Liangchawei. With the help of Liangchawei, the rabbits He learned the profound meanings and showed his supernatural powers, and finally rescued Chang'e.(translated from douban)
